Title: Struggling Against the Perception of Facts
Writer: Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Lucy Maud Montgomery (based on "Anne of Green Gables"), Shernold Edwards, Alina Mankin (executive story editor), Kathryn Borel (executive story editor)
Actors: Dalmar Abuzeid, Cara Ricketts, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Milton Barnes
Plot: With a wedding on the horizon, Anne wonders what kind of bride she'd like to be. Marilla sees an oculist, and Bash meets a friendly face in "The Bog".
